price: Gospodar nebesa i Zemlje i onog što je između njih i Gospodar istokā!
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā warabbu al-mashāriqi
